name: TransitStyle

aliases.name: Style
aliases.comment: Just an alias for elm-html style value

values.name: compose
values.comment: Compose an animation with `exit` and `enter` phases.

values.name: fadeSlide
values.comment: Combine fade and slideLeft with the specified offset

values.name: slide
values.comment:
Slide animation, with the specified offset.
Greater than 0 to right, lesser to left.

values.name: slideIn
values.comment: Slide in (enter) by translating on X for desired offset

values.name: slideOut
values.comment: Slide out (exit) by translating on X for desired offset
